name: GeographyQuest
description:
GeographyQuest 1.3.2

A simple quiz game on countries, capitals and flags of the world.

I made this game more than seven years ago, but thought I might submit it here with just minor updates, to support this great LiveCode Game Jam initiative.

The game lets you practice your geography skills in terms of the connections between countries, capitals and flags of the world. There are different difficulty levels and play modes, and a high-score list.

Swedish speakers can choose to play with Swedish terms, though the interface remains in English.

The Livecode stack has to stay in the folder with the other files. (If I had time to redo the game today, I'd internalize all resources to make it just one file.)
